title: How to sign a letter to someone you don't know - Quora

response.answer_text: In the UK you can use ‘Yours faithfully' if you don't know the recipient (hand have started the letter ’to whom it may concern' or 'dear sir or madam’. If you're addressing the letter to a named person you can end it 'Yours sincerely' If you don't like those you can use 'regards' or 'kind regards' but I use those more for emails.
